results.title: Aggressively managing type 2 diabetes mellitus, hyperlipidemia, and bone loss.
results.text_hl: An aggressive, comprehensive treatment plan developed for this @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ included pharmaceuticals (triple oral therapy: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone hydrochloride@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin phosphate@@@), nutrition counseling (with a registered, licensed dietician), and exercise.

citations.NLM: Spellman CW. Aggressively managing type 2 diabetes mellitus, hyperlipidemia, and bone loss. J Am Osteopath Assoc. 2008 May;108(5 Suppl 3):S20-7. PMID: 18519839
